name: The Three Door Montana Sideboard
description: The Three-Door Montana cabinet is a signature Davidson design that elevates any stylish interior with its understated elegance and simultaneously provides a flexible, luxury storage solution. Sleek flush doors and a recessed plinth base keep its lines sharp, and are complimented by either high gloss or satin finish veneer and a smart metallic trim. The push-latch doors open smoothly to reveal a flawless interior in satin wood to match the exterior, with two adjustable shelves within as standard. There is the option of additional banks of drawers if required with compartments for storing cutlery.
